segments.text: I observe the kitchen from this angled view, taking it all in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area is a disaster with water overflowing continuously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No plug in sight, and the drain isn't working properly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands facing away, absorbed in her dish-drying task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral expression hides the hazard right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens across the floor, soaking the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of bowls and plates sit innocently on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Moving left, the boy climbs the stool toward the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, tempting him with its contents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stool legs splay out, looking ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches eagerly, her palm open for a cookie handout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking treats without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the yard looks serene with its bushes and walkway.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It contrasts sharply with the potential chaos unfolding inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns soon to prevent any harm.
segments.speaker: PAR
